ascend_skill.desc:
When receiving healing, increase damage by 25% for 2 turns. After receiving healing a total of 5 times, gain Tropical Heart (healing received from Blessing counts once per turn).
When using Surf 'n' Shine while Tropical Heart is active, spend Tropical Heart to remove the cooldown time from Surf 'n' Shine. Afterwards, there is a 1-turn cooldown until Tropical Heart can be gained again.
When Tropical Motoha spends HP to use a skill, she will not be KO'd.
ascend_skill.name: Summer Starts Here!

ascend_skill.desc:
When Summer Hype is active, increase critical rate by 10% and critical damage by 25%.
At the start of each turn, increase Tropical Heart's healing counter by 1 and gain 1 Blessing.
ascend_skill.name: Exciting Summer!

ascend_skill.desc:
When Tropical Motoha recieves healing, increase critical damage by 20% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.
During battle, increase her max HP by 1200.
ascend_skill.name: Stay Cool!

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Summer 'Splosion and Surf 'n' Shine by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Catch the Wave!

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: After using a Highlight, increase the next Surf 'n' Shine's damage by 80%.
ascend_skill.name: The Fun Never Ends!

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Blue Sunrise and Thief Tactics by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Another Perfect Day!

ascend_skill.desc:
Tropical Heart will not be spent after using Surf 'n' Shine.
Summer Hype is enhanced to Summer Blowout. When Summer Blowout is active, the bonus damage of Blue Sunrise activates 3 times. Summer 'Splosion recovers 20% more of Tropical Motoha's max HP. Increase the skill multiplier of Surf 'n' Shine by 50%.
ascend_skill.name: Everlasting Summer!

highlight_skill.desc:
Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 195.2%/215.2%/207.2%/227.2% of Attack, and restore 20% of Tropical Motoha's max HP.
If her HP is above 50%, increase Highlight damage by 25%.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 87.8%/96.8%/93.2%/102.2% of Attack. If Summer Hype is active, spend 10% of Tropical Motoha's max HP to deal bonus Bless damage to all foes equal to 29.3%/32.3%/31.1%/34.1% of Attack.
normal_skill.name: Blue Sunrise

normal_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 136.6%/150.6%/145.0%/159.0% of Attack, and restore 20% of Tropical Motoha's max HP. If Summer Hype is active, deal bonus Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 34.2%/37.7%/36.3%/39.8% of Attack.
normal_skill.name: Summer 'Splosion

normal_skill.desc:
Immediately enter the Summer Hype state, which lasts until the end of Tropical Motoha's next turn.
Spend 15% of her max HP to deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 159.7%/176.0%/169.5%/185.8% of Attack.
Summer Hype: Increase critical rate by 9.8%/9.8%/10.4%/10.4% and damage by 29.3%/29.3%/31.1%/31.1%.
normal_skill.name: Surf 'n' Shine

passive_skill.desc: When Tropical Motoha receives healing, increase damage by 30.0% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Energy Overload!

passive_skill.desc: During battle, increase Tropical Motoha's Attack by 24 points for every 100 points of max HP above 8000, up to 1920.
passive_skill.name: Outshine the Sun!
